markdown-sync-image.title: Markdown Image
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod: Method to upload pictures. To the local or another picture CDN service.
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod.Lo: Upload the image to the project directory. You can use markdown-sync-image.local.path sets the relative path for upload.
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod.Co: Upload the image to git repository in Coding.net . You can configure the repository through markdown-sync-image.coding.repository. You need to configure the Token to access the repository through markdown-sync-image.coding.token.
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod.Gi: Upload the image to git repository in GitHub.com . You can configure the repository through markdown-sync-image.github.repository. You need to configure the Token to access the repository through markdown-sync-image.github.token.
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod.Im: Upload the image to Imgur. You can configure `Client Id` through markdown-sync-image.imgur.clientId.
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod.SM: Upload the image to sm.ms. You can configure `Token` through markdown-sync-image.sm_ms.token if you have an account.
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod.Da: Turn the picture into the DATA URL insert.
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod.DI: You can define your code used to upload. You need to configure the code path through markdown-sync-image.DIY.path
markdown-sync-image.base.uploadMethod.Cl: Upload the image to Cloudinary. You can configure `Cloud Name` through markdown-sync-image.cloudinary.cloudName.
Upload the image to Cloudflare Image. You can configure `accountId` through markdown-sync-image.cloudflare.accountId.
markdown-sync-image.base.fileNameFormat:
The filenname and path format string for upload. Not Support in `Imgur` and `SM.MS`. You can use some variables: 

- `${filename}`: The original filename.  
- `${mdname}`: The name of the Markdown file being edited.  
- `${path}`: The path of the Markdown file being edited relative to the root directory.  
- `${hash}`: The sha256 hash of image.  
- `${timestamp}`: The timestamp of upload time.  
- `${YY}`: The Year  
- `${MM}`:The Month  
- `${DD}`: The Day  
- `${hh}`: The 12-hour clock  
- `${HH}`: The 24-hour clock  
- `${mm}`: The minutes  
- `${ss}`: The seconds  
- `${mss}`: The milliseconds  
- `${rand,number}`: A random number, for example: `${rand,100}`. It will generate random numbers from 0 to 99 
- `${prompt}`: Makes it possible to enter a custom name through an input prompt when pasting the image.
markdown-sync-image.base.urlEncode: Whether URL encode for the url of image.
markdown-sync-image.base.imageWidth: The maximum width of the image, if the image is greater than this width, the width is set to this value. Set to 0 means not change.
markdown-sync-image.local.path: Picture storage directory that in the local (automatically created if it does not exist). Notice: You can't use variable in here. You can use variable in `#markdown-sync-image.base.fileNameFormat#`.
markdown-sync-image.local.referencePath: The reference path format in markdown(not include file name). Empty means use relative path. You can use variable of `#markdown-sync-image.base.fileNameFormat#` in here. For example: `/images/${YY}-${MM}/`
markdown-sync-image.coding.path: Picture upload directory that in the repository (automatically created if it does not exist). The repository must initialization first.
markdown-sync-image.github.path: Picture upload directory that in the repository (automatically created if it does not exist). The repository must initialization first.
markdown-sync-image.imgur.clientId: The client id registered with imgur. You can registed it at [here](https://api.imgur.com/oauth2/addclient).
markdown-sync-image.imgur.httpProxy: Connect to Imgur via http proxy.
markdown-sync-image.sm_ms.token: SM.MS API token (Options). You can register an account and then visit [API Token](https://sm.ms/home/apitoken) Page to generate secret token.
markdown-sync-image.cloudinary.folder: Folder to upload the image to.
